      • alignNodeInBounds_byOffsetAndScale

        public static void alignNodeInBounds_byOffsetAndScale(PNode node,
                                      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds,
                                      double halign,
                                      double valign,
                                      double hsizeProportion,
                                      double vsizeProportion)
        Parameters:
        halign - -1 - stick to left side, 0 - center, 1 - stick to right side
        valign - -1 - stick to top side, 0 - middle, 1 - stick to bottom side
        hsizeProportion - 0..1 Proportion of the width of the bounds which the node should take
        vsizeProportion - 0..1 Proportion of the height of the bounds which the node should take

      • alignNodeInBounds_bySetBounds

        public static void alignNodeInBounds_bySetBounds(PNode node,
                                 java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds,
                                 double halign,
                                 double valign,
                                 double hsizeProportion,
                                 double vsizeProportion)
        Parameters:
        bounds - Bounds to align the node within.
        halign - PCanvas.LEFT_ALIGNMENT or RIGHT_ALIGNMENT
        valign - PCanvas.TOP_ALIGNMENT or BOTTOM_ALIGNMENT
        hsizePropoption - 0..1 Proportion of the width of the bounds which the node should take
        vsizeProportion - 0..1 Proportion of the height of the bounds which the node should take
